Baja Sea of Cortez Living, Due Diligence - exceeds your expe

The islands of the Sea of Cortez contain striking natural beauty in a dramatic setting formed by rugged islands with high cliffs and sandy beaches, which contrast with the brilliant reflection from the desert and the surrounding turquoise waters.

Marina CostaBaja is nestled in La Paz, Baja California Sur Mexico; in the heart of one of the most talked about and sought after destinations in the world; the Sea of Cortez. Offers the perfect blend of Baja kayaking, hiking, snorkeling and diving. Abundant wildlife, massive whales, sunny weather and warm, crystalline waters make the Sea of Cortez in Loreto Bay National Marine Park one of the best winter sea kayaking and whale watching destinations in North America.

This winter escape the freezing cold to visit the 550 acre master planned community of CostaBaja. The property offers a wide spectrum of activities from relaxing on the beach to swimming with hammer head sharks. With the worlds current economic impact travel and lifestyle plans have changed perspectives these past few years; quality of life has changed.

Absolutely, do your due diligence while staying at CostaBaja’s 5 star Resort and Spa, enjoy the par 72 Signature Gary Player Golf Course with 14 of the 18 holes featuring sea views. Make the most of your opportunity to view guided property tours; CostaBaja is honored to present each custom spaciously designed home that will meet and exceed your expectations of living on the Sea of Cortez, in La Paz, Mexico.

There is current slip availability at Marina CostaBaja for vessels 30 ft. to 50 ft. The 250 prime slips are constructed by state of the art concrete docks; accommodating vessels ranging from 30 ft. up to 220 ft.; a premiere double-basin marina facing a variety of water front restaurants and first-class amenities. The in house management is lead by dock master Gabriel Ley and his experience maritime savvy marina staff. Marina CostaBaja is one of the safest marina’s in Mexico with 24 hours on site security at the marina and through out the entire CostaBaja property.

Buying Real Estate in Mexico

With its naturally beautiful landscapes and amazing beaches, rich history and warm, inviting people, it’s no wonder that more and more individuals are not only choosing Mexico as their vacation destination but also a place to live as well. CostaBaja homes, in particular, are known for providing an atmosphere of functionality and security that is family oriented and filled with the most unique, spacious and innovatively designed residences. When it comes to real estate in Mexico, there are a few helpful things to keep in mind.

Know What You Want

There are different types of property available for sale in Mexico. While having many options is ideal, on the other hand, it can also be overwhelming and intimidating, especially for first time buyers. However, one of the most useful steps a person can take before becoming involved in this process is to sit down and evaluate what criteria the property must meet. Think about your lifestyle and interests, as well as that of your family. Do you prefer to live near the water? Then you’ll want to narrow down your choices to beach real state for sale. Would you rather stay closer to where the action is? Then you may want to look into land for sale in or near the more populous cities in Mexico.

Needs vs. Wants

When dealing with real estate Mexico, you’ll want to make sure your final decision is one that you’ll be happy with in the years to come. Of course there is such a thing as being too fixated on your list of “wants.” Sticking too closely to such criteria is a surefire way to limit your options and make the process of finding the ideal Mexico land for sale much more difficult. Instead, learn how to compromise and break down your list of criteria into items that you “need” the property to have. Anything else is simply a perk that should not be used as a deal breaker.

Do Research

What better way to know what it would be like to live in Mexico than to spend time there? This type of research is ideal for helping you envision whether or not a life in this country would be the right fit for you and your family. Talk to the people, tour the available properties and sample what daily living could be like. Make sure to connect with a reputable real estate agent that has the most current listings available and knows each one inside and out. Requesting a personal tour is one of the most important parts of the process that really allows people to get an inside look at not only the residence itself but the community as a whole.

For more information on CostaBaja, please visit http://www.costabaja.com

The Perfect Golf Trip Get Away for Boaters

CostaBaja is the perfect golf trip get away destination; family, friends and colleagues will enjoy the relaxed resort lifestyle with plenty of activities on the Sea of Cortez. Recently CostaBaja held their inauguration for the par 72, Signature Gary Player Golf course where 14 of the 18 holes have sea views. The Gary Player Design Firm is known for creating golf courses that are built in harmony with the natural topography and environment. CostaBaja is committed to preserving and protecting the surrounding ecosystem. Stay tuned for CostaBaja Club membership details, tournaments and events to come in 2011.

One of the safest locations in Mexico is CostaBaja located in La Paz, Baja California Sur. Located two & a half hours north of Los Cabos by car and a mere two hour flight from Los Angeles, CA with connecting flights from most major airlines. CostaBaja is located 7.5 klm from down town historic La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

The 550 acre master plan community of CostaBaja includes; a double basin marina with 250 prime slips, state of the art concrete docks; accommodating vessels ranging from 30 ft. up to 220 ft. with first-class amenities, and in house marina management lead by dock master Gabriel Ley and his experienced marina staff are exceptional. Current slip availably is for vessels 30 ft. to 50 ft.; escape this 2011 winter cold for sea life and sunshine.

Noted as one of the top resorts in Mexico; located in the heart of the 550-acre CostaBaja development is the first 5-star resort in La Paz. Featuring 24-hour room service; beach front tennis courts; home to the first Spa in La Paz; specialty restaurants, with 115 hotel rooms offering a selection of ocean, mountain, golf course and marina views.

The Master Planned Community developed by CostaBaja features ocean front and hill side residences now available. Each slice real estate has been carefully designed with spacious intentions to meet and exceed expectations of life in La Paz, Mexico. Indulge in the hospitality of the warm Latin lifestyle.

For additional details visit: www.costabaja.com or to make a reservation contact: gley@marinacostabaja.com Make your dream a 2011 reality, we look forward to seeing soon at CostaBaja, La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

Dockage at Marina CostaBaja while Diving in the Warm Turquoi

The Sea of Cortez is the sparkling body of warm turquoise water that is host to thousands of prolific marine life. Jacques Cousteau, the famous French diver and documentary filmmaker dubbed it both the "world's aquarium" and the "Galapagos of North America."

Surrounded by natural beauty nestled between sea and mountains on the Sea of Cortez rests; Marina CostaBaja. The 550 acre master planned community is the resting and relaxation hot spot for diver’s to enjoy the near by underwater playground. The Sea of Cortez is one of the world’s phenomena’s; bringing explores divers and oceanography scientists from all over the world.

Marina CostaBaja features its own personal in house management with a number of enhanced changes, services and marina standards. Dock master Gabriel Ley, and his seasoned marina staff are happy to accommodate transient tenants as well as full time marina tenants 365 days a year. Marina Costa Baja currently has slips available to vessel 30 ft. to 50 ft. The 250 slip marina has a range of slips from 30 ft. up to 220 ft.; the state of the art double basin marina features CostaBaja’s Resort and Spa; a variety or restaurants, fresh deli, on site medical physician, marine supplies and provisions.

Real Estate is available for luxury living on the Sea of Cortez at CostaBaja. Spacious residences with mountain and sea views have been custom designed with careful attention to detail amercing each property into the natural surrounding ecosystem.

Diving in the Sea of Cortez; with the best visibility, warmest water and calmest seas is absolute underwater paradise. It is always exciting to see hammerhead sharks and they usually appear at Gordo Bank and the El Bajo seamount. Whale sharks are typically present off El Mogote and may provide an unforgettable addition to your trip. The colony of California sea lions at Los Islotes are quite famous and will entertain you for hours with their playful underwater antics. Moray eels are numerous at certain sites that divers joke about them living in “moray condos”.

The Sea of Cortez is home to countless turtles in these waters; divers will likely spot large schools of jacks, tunas, lots of small rays, garden eels and species of fish too numerous to count. Giant manta rays are present but sightings have been sparse in the last couple of years. Invertebrate life includes stony corals, seafans, gorgonians and yellow colonial tubastrea corals.

Sea of Cortez dive trips make for enjoyable days swimming in a giant aquarium with an amazing diversity of animals in bath temperature water. Surface temperatures range from well over 100 degrees in September to the mid eighties in November. Water temps vary from 76 to 86 degrees F (25 to 30 degrees C) and diveskins, 3 mil or 5 mil wetsuits are very popular. There is a remote chance of a tropical storm early in the fall season; but is very unlikely. Most days will be sunny with the very occasional day that is either overcast or rainy. The first “Norte” (or north wind) does not usually blow until late November.

No fear if family or friends are more incline to view sea life above the water line instead of below; they will have an unforgettable topside experiences watching whale-sharks choosing to approach the Nautilus Explorer and use the side of the boat as a backboard to feed on plankton, dolphins, pilot whales and the absolutely spectacular starlit Mexican sky at night looming off the Sea of Cortez.

Divers bear in mind Marina CostaBaja does not use the following words lightly, “state-of –the-art-amenities.” It’s a known fact while docked at Marina CostaBaja you will enjoy the finest of modern day marina capabilities. To the well traveled or novas marina tenant; by now you have visited enough marina’s and dive sites around the globe to form a balanced opinion of a “state-of-the-art-marina” and the way it should look and feel; while dockside. Marina CostaBaja’s special features brought to marina tenants with thoughtful consideration and excellent yacht care services in mind, year round at Marina CostaBaja, La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

CostaBaja’s state of the art marina provides secure dock boxes with integrated lighting; desalinated water hook-up at each slip; a high-tech pump-out system servicing each slip; crew lounge with satellite T.V. wireless internet, restrooms and shower facilities; 24 hour staff and security, helpful on site – in house marina staff; the largest full service fuel dock in the area, unlimited fuel supply available; and metered electricity: 30 amp/120V, 50 amp/220V, 100 amp/220V, 100 amo/480V single phase and three phase.

For additional details visit: or to make a reservation contact: gley@marinacostabaja.com Make your dream a 2011 reality, we look forward to seeing soon at CostaBaja, La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico

Marina CostaBaja Rests in the Heart of Endless Adventurous A

CostaBaja is a convent get away location; its two and a half hours north of Los Cabos by car; and a mere 2 hour flight from Los Angeles, CA with connecting flights from most major airlines. Marina Costa Baja is located 7.5 klm from down town La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

The 550 acre master planned community offers an on site fresh deli, convince store, historic museum & ecological museum, a number of unique store fronts, an site medical physician, restaurants in the heart of Marina CostaBaja’s basin and shuttle service to and from downtown La Paz.

CostaBaja rests in the center of endless adventures, attractions and activities such as; whale watching in Magdalena Bay; snorkeling and kayaking throughout calm waters; visit the historic Mission of Nuestra Senora de Pilar del La Paz; horseback into the desert hills to discover towering Cardón; the world’s largest cactus; engulf yourself in the endless eco-tourism opportunities offered in La Paz, Baja California Sur Mexico. When you feeling the need for speed kite board and windsurf in Los Barriles; enjoy winter winds with excellent spots to zip through the sea among sandy beaches; next visit Todos Santos, a surfing destination with streets of hospitality lined with galleries featuring painters and sculptors and last but not least Jacques Cousteau, the famous French diver and documentary filmmaker dubbed the Sea of Cortez as the "world's aquarium.” These are a few major attractions which have been noted as the most enjoyable by tenants at Marina CostaBaja.

Costa Baja is surrounded by over 4,000 plants thrive in the near by ecosystem with countless coyotes, foxes, pumas and bighorn sheep make these abundant lands their home. Punta Coyote and San Evaristo beaches offer an excellent camping experience where you will see fast-moving lizards and roadrunners throughout the landscape.

Cruisers, sailors & anglers; bear in mind Marina CostaBaja does not use the following words lightly, “state-of –the-art-amenities.” It’s a known fact while docked at Marina CostaBaja you will enjoy the finest of modern day marina capabilities. Each marina amenity is provided to all tenants with thoughtful consideration and excellent yacht care services in mind, 365 days a year at Marina CostaBaja, La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

Marina CostaBaja features 250 prime slips, state of the art concrete docks, accommodating vessels ranging from 30 ft. up to 220 ft. A premiere double-basin marina and first-class amenities, secure dock boxes with integrated lighting, desalinated water hook-up at each slip, a high-tech pump-out system servicing each slip; crew lounge with satellite T.V. wireless internet, restrooms and shower facilities; 24 hour staff and security, helpful on site – in house marina staff; the largest full service fuel dock in the area with unlimited fuel supply available; metered electricity: 30 amp/120V, 50 amp/220V, 100 amp/220V, 100 amo/480V single phase and three phase; everything a boater would wish to have at a marina is already in place at Marina CostaBaja.

Majestically Located between Sea and Mountains the 550 acre development is surrounded by pristine white sand beaches, crystal blue bays and majestic volcanic mountains. Located on the Sea of Cortez, in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico; noted as some of the best year round sport fishing on the globe. CostaBaja is nestled in a master planned community offering a luxury resort lifestyle. The Gary Player Signature Golf Course features 18 holes, par 72 with water views from 14 holes. Offering mountain and sea views is the gorgeous CostaBaja Resort and Spa, indulge in CostaBaja’s Master Planned Community.

For additional details visit: www.costabaja.com or to make a reservation contact: gley@marinacostabaja.com Make your dream a 2011 reality, we look forward to seeing soon at CostaBaja, La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

Plan a trip with your family to La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico for an unforgettable bonding experience with memories that will last a lifetime. CostaBaja is the perfect family get away destination; families will enjoy a relaxed pace with plenty of activities on the Sea of Cortez.

Alaska Airlines and Horizon Air announce 2011 winter fare specials from LA, CA to La Paz, MX. "There's never been a better time to get away to Mexico with these low fares to your choice of nine great destinations," said Joe Sprague, Alaska Airlines; vice president of marketing. "Chose from the classic beach resorts of Mazatlan, Puerto Vallarta/Riviera Nayarit, Los Cabos, Ixtapa/Zihuatanejo and Manzanillo, to the quieter Baja villages of La Paz and Loreto, to the colonial cities of Guadalajara and Mexico City."

Its easy travel to CostaBaja in La Paz; located two & a half hours north of Los Cabos by car and a mere two hour flight from Los Angeles, CA with connecting flights from most major airlines. CostaBaja is located 7.5 klm from down town historic La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

The 550 acre master plan community of CostaBaja includes; a double basin marina with 250 prime slips, state of the art concrete docks; accommodating vessels ranging from 30 ft. up to 220 ft. with first-class amenities, and in house marina management lead by dock master Gabriel Ley and his seasoned marina staff. Super Yachts, cruisers, anglers and sailors enjoy their dockage experience at Marina CostaBaja where meeting the needs of each tenants and excellent hospitality keeps the same seasonal vessels returning each year to La Paz, Mexico to enjoy winters warm sunshine on the Sea of Cortez.

CostaBaja recently held their inauguration for the par 72, Signature Gary Player Golf course where 14 of the 18 holes have sea views. Also noted as one of the top resorts in Mexico; located in the heart of the 550-acre CostaBaja development is the first 5-star resort in La Paz. Featuring 24-hour room service; beach front tennis courts; home to the first Spa in La Paz; specialty restaurants, a 2477 sq foot ballroom for corporate events, conventions, reunions and retreats. The facility can also be divided into three different spaces for smaller intimate functions; with 115 hotel rooms offering a selection of ocean, mountain, golf course and marina views; in-room features include 42-inch flat-screen televisions, glass enclosed showers, and dark mahogany wood finishes contrasting the bright majestic surroundings. One get away trip to CostaBaja and it will be hard to head home after this luxury experience.

Indulge in CostaBaja’s Master Planned Community, ocean front and hill side residences available. Enhance your quality of life on the Sea of Cortez, each slice real estate has been carefully designed to meet and exceed expectations of life in La Paz, Mexico.

For additional details visit: or to make a reservation contact: gley@marinacostabaja.com Make your dream a 2011 reality, we look forward to seeing soon at CostaBaja, La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

The marina with all the bells and whistles, Marina CostaBaja

Marina CostaBaja is one Mexico’s safest marinas. With 250 prime slips, it can accommodate vessels ranging from 30 ft.-220 ft. This premiere double-basin marina rests in the heart of the Sea of Cortez; with first-class amenities and state of the art concrete docks. Also featuring the largest fuel dock in the area; and 24 hour security. CostaBaja is proud of the in house marina management lead by dock master Gabriel Lay and his experienced and seasoned marina staff and yacht care service team.

Boaters, how many marinas have you been that still have wooden docks with nails that catch your shoes as you walk down the dock? How many marinas’ can you think of today that offer full time 24 hour security 365 days a year? Can you name all the marina’s you have visited in the last year that have pump out service right in your slip? Can you name the number of marina’s who have an on site yacht care service team? If these questions strike a cord; this must means you have not stayed at the state of art first class Marina CostaBaja, in La Paz, Baja California Sur Mexico. Now offering current slip availability for vessels 30 ft. to 50 ft.

CostaBaja is majestically located between sea and mountains; the 550 acre development is surrounded by pristine white sand beaches, crystal blue bays and majestic volcanic mountains. The master planned community includes a five star resort and spa; Signature Gary Player par 72 golf course; with 14 of the 18 holes featuring sea views. Hill side and ocean front residence are now available; this luxury lifestyle is very easy to become accustom to in La Paz, Mexico.

For additional details visit: www.costabaja.com or to make a reservation contact: gley@marinacostabaja.com Make your dream a 2011 reality, we look forward to seeing soon at CostaBaja, La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

Marina CostaBaja is your perfect destination; La Paz, Mexico

Marina CostaBaja is nestled just outside the town of La Paz, Baja California Sur Mexico; in the heart of one of the most talked about and sought after destinations in the world at the gateway to the Sea of Cortez. The islands of the Sea of Cortez contain striking natural beauty in a dramatic setting formed by rugged islands with high cliffs and sandy beaches, which contrast with the brilliant reflection from the desert and the surrounding turquoise waters.

For much of the year, La Paz has a very mild climate, with warm afternoons and cool evenings. Summertime temperatures from July through September can be hot for some and perfectly comfortable for others who enjoy temperatures in the 90’s and 100’s Fahrenheit. If you’re not fond of rain than La Paz is your perfect destination; the average rainfall in La Paz is around 6 inches per year.

CostaBaja is located 7.5 klm north of down town La Paz, Baja California Sur Mexico. The charm and beauty of historic La Paz captures nearly everyone who passes through. Although La Paz has all the modern conveniences and growing population, its tranquility and easy nature set it apart from the bustling cities and tourist towns.

The 550 acre master planned community is the home of Marina CostaBaja featuring 250 prime slips constructed by state of the art concrete docks; accommodating vessels ranging from 30 ft. up to 220 ft.; a premiere double-basin marina facing a variety of water front restaurants and first-class amenities. The in house management is lead by dock master Gabriel Ley and his experience seasoned marina staff. Marina CostaBaja is one of the safest marina’s in Mexico with 24 hour on site security at the marina and through out the entire CostaBaja property.

For additional details visit: www.costabaja.com or to make a slip reservation contact: gley@marinacostabaja.com We look forward to seeing you soon in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

Live, Play, Boating & much more on the Sea of Cortez, La

Enjoy cruising around Espiritu Santo Island and kayaking in the Sea of Cortez then head back to your slip at Marina CostaBaja and put the boat to bed. With in a few steps away from the dock let your feet guide you to CostaBaja’s Spa to indulge in complete relaxation.

Enjoy complete comprehensive health and wellness care in an environment that integrates conventional and holistic methods with a definitive sensorial experience. Expand on a variety of health and beauty therapies that nurture your skin, body, and well-being.

CostaBaja is the luxury real estate development designed as a 550 acre master planned community located at the “Gateway to the Sea of Cortez” in La Paz, Baja California Sur Mexico. Spacious hillside and seaside condos feature expansive views of the Sea of Cortez; the residences have a broad range of floor plans and custom design features that meet the needs and compliment each unique lifestyle. Enjoy the Baja inspired homes with their natural eco-friendly environment.

CostaBaja's exclusive residence owner's beach club has the Sea of Cortez as a magnificent backdrop that calls out to you to discover the wonders of the sea snorkeling or kayaking through the calm waters. If fresh water is more your style, swim laps or just splash around in the stunning infinity edged pool. You can also just relax on the pristine white sand beach, recline under the shade of a palapa or take a siesta in one of the in-pool cooling loungers. Don't miss the state-of the-art workout center or the nearby tennis courts. Pamper yourself to an exquisite lunch and have a Margarita while you watch the sunset. Relax and have fun, the Beach Club staff takes care of everything else.

Luxury Residences Available at CostaBaja Own Real Estate wit

Boat owners realize the importance of the key phase, ‘location, location, location’. Your lifestyle is what distinguishes you from others; where we live is an expression of our life, hobby, interests, style, taste and pallet for specific cuisine based on the geographical location. CostaBaja offers a unique lifestyle filled with comfort, state-of-the-art facilities and exceptional service with in a master planned 550 acre luxury resort community, offering all the bells and whistles.

If you have ever considered living or retiring in Mexico or just owning real estate in Mexico, CostaBaja is the place you have been looking for. Every residence has been carefully designed to ensure a theme of spaciousness and functionality. Individual neighborhoods offer 24 hour on-site security and community areas, many with neighborhood swimming pools. Come and discover why CostaBaja is the perfect place for living in Mexico, make your residence the destination for your children, grandchildren and friends to visit and enjoy quality time together enjoying the Baja inspired lifestyle.

CostaBaja is a master planned community that offers luxury living in Mexico. The exceptional amenities and spectacular natural setting make every day an adventure: golf, fishing, scuba diving, snorkeling, boating, kayaking, sailing, hiking, and the charm of nearby La Paz, are all yours to enjoy as an owner of real estate in Mexico at CostaBaja. For boat owners owning a home with a view of your boat in the slip is more than buying the dream; it’s living the dream. Turn your dream into a reality; make the most of this opportunity.

Located on the majestic Sea of Cortez, known as ‘The Worlds Aquarium’ by Jacques Cousteau; nestled in the gateway of this master planned community is Marina CostaBaja a modern state of the art marina accommodating vessels 30 ft. up to 220 ft; with concrete docks featuring first class services and amenities; nestled in the heart of CostaBaja’s 550 acre master planned community in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

Marina CostaBaja Hosts the October 28, 2011 Event at FLIBS

Marina CostaBaja is one of Mexico’s leading sought after destinations. CostaBaja is located in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico. This year at the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show (FLIBS) Marina CostaBaja teamed up with many maritime colleagues to produce a great event – The Pre ‘Yacht Next Table Setting Competition’ Event. This high brow competition was created 4 years ago by Joanne Lockhart owner of Yacht Next in Fort Lauderdale, FL. Lockhart’s team of judges select the top 15 luxury super yachts in North America featuring there vessels in FLIBS. The most seasoned, educated and knowledgeable stews compete for the ‘Best in Show’ and ‘Color Splash’ table setting competition. These beautiful women who compete are very competitive stews who take this compitition very seriously; it’s a noted accomplishment to be in the top 3 of this completion. They take great pride in their style, technique and composition; after all they work for some of the most noted super yacht owners in the world. These women have had plenty technique table setting practice to date underway with the boss and family on board.

Marina CostaBaja’s FLIBS event was encouraged by participation and support from maritime colleagues from Pacific Bound Yachts, Bahia Mar Marina, Crew Network, Fraser Yachts, Fraser Yacht Insurance, Intl Yacht Training, Crew Unlimited, USSA, Yacht Next, Northrop & Johnson, Luke Brown Yachts, National Marine, Smallwood’s Yacht Wear, ISS & GMTravel, Dynasty Restoration, Big Blue Yacht Wear & much more….. The maritime support and encouragement is always appreciated at FLIBS; North America’s largest boat show. Marina Costa Baja looks forward to many more successful shows together; as each year CostaBaja and its 550 acre master planned luxury resort community become more and more of an interest to North American’s who want to either cruise south on their own bottom or have taken an interest in buying property in Mexico or retiring in Mexico. Luxury Residences are available at CostaBaja; featuring the finest in finishes, a wide variety of floor plans and Baja inspired homes that compliment your lifestyle for enjoyment and relaxation.

Located on the majestic Sea of Cortez, known as ‘The Worlds Aquarium’ by Jacques Cousteau; nestled in the gateway of this master planned community is Marina CostaBaja a modern state of the art marina accommodating vessels 30 ft. up to 220 ft; with concrete docks featuring first class services and amenities; nestled in the heart of CostaBaja’s 550 acre master planned community in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico. You’re invited to cruise south this winter.

State-of-the-Art Features Include Countless First Class Amen

Marina CostaBaja encourages you to dock your vessel at our state-of-the-art marina. This 550-acre property is a master-planned, unique, custom-designed community; everything you want in a state-of-the-art marina exists at Marina CostaBaja. Resting in the heart of the Sea of Cortez is an added benefit to nature lovers - the cruising grounds take your breath away. 
 
An added benefit to this excellent location is that you have the option to cruise back to your slip in the evenings; then dine on land steps away from your boat. The Sea of Cortez offers a wide canvas of activities such as kayaking, snorkeling, diving, swimming with seals, hiking on the islands, and dropping the hook in one of many secluded coves for lunch in the calm, safe, and secure waters. 

Whether your goal is relaxing while cruising or adventurous water activities, it's up to you to custom design what best meets your social or private cruising desires. Whatever you're seeking, you will discover it at Marina CostaBaja in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico. Our seasoned in-house marina management is on site for your assistance year round. 

250 slip double basin marina accommodating vessels 30 ft. up to 220 ft.
Medical services and accessible on-site physician
Secure dock boxes, internet services, crew lounge, laundry services
Each slip contains pump out service, total boat care services, supply services
In-house seasoned marina management, 24-hour year-round security, 1st class marina services steps away from your slip
The largest fuel dock in the area with high speed fueling capabilities located at the marina fairway entrance, three phase power supply 30 amps/110v to 100amps/480v
Wide variety of gourmet restaurants, convenient store, museum, sight seeing attractions, diving, tour services, charter services, events & on site activates

CostaBaja Resort, La Paz, Mexico

Located on the azure Sea of Cortez, CostaBaja Resort and Spa enjoys the distinction of being the only 5-star resort in the city of La Paz, on Mexico’s Baja peninsula.

La Paz means “the peace” – a feeling that is transformed throughout CostaBaja, nestled between the serene desert and the majestic breeze-swept Sea of Cortez which was dubbed “the world’s aquarium” by Jacques Cousteau.

The resort covers 550 acres of environmentally protected coastal lands including:

* Hotel, beach club, and private residences

* 250-slip marina complete with shopping, galleries, and restaurants

* Espiritu day spa

* The first Gary Player golf course in Mexico with panoramic views of the sea

* White sand, palm-fringed beach with palapas

* Swimming pool, infinity pool, and lap pool

* Selection of restaurants on site including Steinbeck’s which holds the Record Guiness 400 original bottles of golden tequila and 2011 “Best Young Chef”

* Banquet, meeting, and wedding facilities

There’s something to please everyone at CostaBaja.com. In addition to the above amenities, it’s a short 10-minute drive downtown to the Malécon, a seaside walkway where you can sample authentic Baja cuisine and delicacies such as chocolate clams and octopus as well as a front row seat to spectacular sunsets on the Sea of Cortez.

CostaBaja is strategically located for easy access to diverse sea activities including scuba diving or snorkeling with sea lions, dolphins, manta rays and whale sharks, sailing, and fishing. Landlubbers can enjoy hiking and horseback riding through trails carved through hills revealing panoramic views.

Experience for yourself the “peace and abundance” of La Paz at CostaBaja Resort and Spa!

Start your day at Espiritu Santo Island & end your day r

Enjoy cruising around Espiritu Santo Island and kayaking in the Sea of Cortez then head back to your slip at Marina CostaBaja. With in a few steps away from the dock let your footsteps guide you to CostaBaja’s Spa to indulge in complete relaxation. Enjoy complete comprehensive health and wellness care in an environment that integrates conventional and holistic methods. Expand on a variety of health and beauty therapies that nurture your skin, body, and well-being. CostaBaja is home to the 1st spa in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico.

Marina CostaBaja features state of the art 250 slip double basin marina, accommodating vessels ranging from 30 ft. up to 220 ft.; with concrete docks featuring first class services and amenities, 24 hour security, laundry services, concierge services, secure dock boxes, pump out services, full service crew lounge, supply and sourcing services, large full service fuel dock at the fairway entrance, a variety of on site gourmet restaurants and medical services and accessible on-site physician.

Located on the majestic Sea of Cortez, known as ‘The Worlds Aquarium’ by Jacques Cousteau; nestled in the gateway of this master planned community is Marina CostaBaja; one of the finest, carefully planned, full service marina’s that exist today; world wide. “Marina CostaBaja is my boss’s favorite marina in Mexico; he and his family enjoy the privacy as well as a safe community feeling as they stroll around the property during their routine visit a few months out of the year,” says a World Renown Super Yacht Captain.
